Title: Why Tesla Stock Popped Ahead of First-Quarter Deliveries
Summary: Tesla shares are up as investors anticipate the company's Q1 production and delivery results. While there are concerns about falling sales and Musk's political involvement, the refreshed Model Y was a bestseller in China in March. Investors will be closely watching the upcoming data for signs of how these factors are impacting the company.

Title: The Smartest Index ETF to Buy With $1,000 Right Now
Summary: The article discusses the current market uncertainty, particularly in the tech sector, and recommends the Invesco QQQ ETF as a good investment option during this time. It highlights the ETF's strong performance over the past decade and the potential for long-term wealth building through consistent monthly investments.
